title: Lady Gaga Takes A Serious Tumble Off Stage In Las Vegas, Has Whole Body X-Ray After Fall
text:
Lady Gaga Takes A Serious Tumble Off Stage In Las Vegas, Has Whole Body X-Ray After Fall

Lady Gaga Takes A Serious Tumble Off Stage In Las Vegas, Has Whole Body X-Ray After Fall

For people attending Lady Gaga's sold-out Las Vegas residency show Enigma, it's a memory that will last a lifetime.

The singer known for her out of the box fashion sense and over the top concert performances, the Las Vegas was more than just a tumble.

Gaga who loves to connect with the audience pulled a fan over to the stage during the performance, but the fans stunt of lifting her up on stage turned awry.

GAGA FALLING OFF STAGE WITH A FAN MOMENTS AGO... #ENIGMA pic.twitter.com/jD65GdpaQe — LG Updates (@LadyGagaVegas) October 18, 2019

Lady Gaga had reportedly invited the fan named Jack to join her onstage. As soon as Jack climbed up, Gaga jumped into his arms and the two immediately lost balance.

Both of them slipped and took a serious tumble off the stage; fans present in the front ring of the venue were in absolutely disbelief while filming the accident.

A caption on a fan's snapchat (which shows a painful close up of the fall) reads, 'Holy Shit! I can' believe I caught that on camera, wait for her to fall.'

Gaga urged the fan who accidentally dropped her off stage not to blame himself as he was crying after the incident, she then proceeded to perform the next song with him asking for people on the internet to be kind and not bully him: "It takes two to tango". pic.twitter.com/lExFsr6Ccq — Lady Gaga Facts (@LGMonsterFacts) October 18, 2019

Gaga plummeted off of Park MGM’s Park Theater stage and landed in the pit of the audience on her back. At the time of the accident, the singer was being held by a male fan who she had invited onstage with her.

BBC quoted her saying, "It's amazing. We love each other so much we fell off the damn stage. We fell into each other's arms. We're like Jack and Rose from Titanic. I suppose we should have some tea after that."

In a social media post after the fall, Gaga revealed that she was out through a rigorous full-body scan to ensure that she didn’t break any bones in her body.

Lady Gaga and a fan suffered a major fall at #Enigma tonight! 😱 pic.twitter.com/3YplZSUHIG — The Pop Hub (@ThePopHub) October 18, 2019

“When they have to X-Ray almost your entire body…” she wrote on Instagram and Twitter beside a photo of her hand X-ray, in which she held up the “OK” gesture.

Despite the hard fall, Gaga quickly recovered and returned to the stage to continue her show, that's what stars do!
description: Lady Gaga and a fan tumbled from the stage at Park Theater on Thursday night as the superstar resumed her Enigma residency. One day after the dramatic encounter, the singer revealed on social media that she had to get X-rays At the time of the accident, the singer was being held by a male fan who she had invited onstage with her
